page.title: 04Sutton-at-Hone school
page.content: At Sutton-at-Hone (Controlled) school there are 9 teachers including the head teacher.There are 267 pupils-138 boys and 129 girls-whose ages range from 5-11yrs.The school has 1 caretaker and a cleaner,5 kitchen staff,5 dinner supervisors and a secretary.The building is 20yrs old and has a staff oom ,hall (but no special dining room) nd a library.There are also 2 visual Aids rooms,radios in each class,2 TVs-1 colour and 1 black and white,tape recorders,videos and a computer. Outside,the school has a playground and a large field.The school is also lucky enough to have a swimming pool on the site which was paid for and built by parents.Lessons taught here are the same as for Downsview and St Pauls schools.
